title: Rahu Transit in the 5th House for Leo Ascendant
summary: Rahu transiting the fifth house heightens creativity, desire for recognition, and speculative instincts for Leo ascendants. Attraction toward unconventional romance, entertainment, and risk-taking increases. While ideas feel bold and original, judgment can swing to extremes. This phase favors innovation in creative pursuits and learning, provided ego and impulsiveness are controlled. When discipline guides desire, Rahu converts curiosity into standout expression without unnecessary risks.

sections.heading: Career
points: Creative, media, or performance roles highlighted

closing: This transit amplifies creative desire. With discipline and awareness, Rahu turns bold expression into meaningful achievement.
